Fields.Field: Line label (e.g. Kα1, Kβ1, K-M4, Lα1).
Vacancy shell (destination shell): K, L1, L2, L3, M1...
Natural Lorentzian HWHM. Computed as 0.5*(Γ_dest+Γ_src) from level widths (FWHM).
Width source id (see Sources). Only present when hwhm is present.
xraylib RadRate: radiative branching ratio within the vacancy shell. May be absent if not provided.

Meta.Notes: Lines with energy >= EnergyThreshold only. Fields: e(keV), l(label), vs(vacancy shell), hwhm(eV), src(width source id), rr(xraylib RadRate). hwhm: Lorentzian HWHM (eV), 0.5*(Γ_dest+Γ_src) from level widths (FWHM). If hwhm is missing, width data was unavailable. If rr is missing, xraylib did not provide a value for that line.
